reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate summing major intestinal disease categories: infectious gastroenteritis (2000-3000 per 100k, regional variation), inflammatory bowel disease (1.5 per 100k incidence), celiac disease (0.5-1 per 100k), diverticular disease (200-300 per 100k in developed countries), peptic ulcer disease (10-20 per 100k), intestinal parasitic infections (high in developing regions), and other intestinal disorders. Global average ~8500 per 100k accounting for geographic variation and disease heterogeneity. Low confidence due to heterogeneity, wide geographic variation, and overlap between acute/chronic categories.
